turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you call and place an order for two large pizzas for me and the girlfriend tonight?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutely. Where would you like me to order it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Papa John's right off the highway that I always order from.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. The usual place. So how do you want the crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Both thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Both thin crust. Got it. Do you want garlic flavored crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. Just regular thin crust with no flavors, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Regular with no flavors. Sauce wise, do you just want classic marinara?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please. And make sure the sauce is light on both pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Light classic marinara on both. And what about the toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order one with just pepperoni for the girl and the other with pepperoni and mushrooms for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. One with pepperoni and the other with pepperoni and mushrooms. Now how do you want these baked?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Both well done, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well done on both. Okay. You want me to make any other modifications or add anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think if you could add a two liter diet Pepsi for the girl, that should be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. A two liter diet pepsi. You sure you don't need a drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nah, I have a few cases of soda at the house.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. So I have a two liter diet Pepsi two large, regular thin crust pizzas with light classic marinara sauce, baked well done and one with mushrooms and the other with pepperoni and mushrooms?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's one with pepperoni and the other with pepperoni and mushrooms.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sorry. One with pepperoni and the other with pepperoni and mushrooms.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, stand by while I place the order...

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so your order has been placed. They said give them roughly 25 orders and your pizzas will be ready for pick up. And your receipt will be sent via email.

items.name: make sure the sauce is light
